News Forum - Blow and behold: British man’s nose for trouble at Phuket AirportWow!! Pretty accurate scales the police uses. 4.11 grammes. One sneeze would see that dust belong to everyone. Just like a fart. -
0
News Forum - Phayao abbot leaves monkhood after photos with partner emergeA well-known abbot and subdistrict head monk in Mueang district, Phayao province, has left the monkhood following the circulation of photos showing him dining with his male partner. The incident, which took place in Phetchabun province, led to significant public attention. Yesterday morning, February 19, the abbot completed the formal process of leaving the monkhood … … The story Phayao abbot leaves monkhood after photos with partner emerge as seen on Thaiger News. Read the full story -
0
News Forum - Police arrest 32 in Kanchanaburi smuggling operationPolice in Kanchanaburi pursued a gang smuggling illegal workers, resulting in the arrest of 32 people. The driver managed to escape, abandoning the vehicle. Workers were found with a string tied to their wrists, indicating their intended work locations in various provinces. Police Major General Khongkrit Lertsitthikul, commander of the Highway Police Division, and Police … … The story Police arrest 32 in Kanchanaburi smuggling operation as seen on Thaiger News. Read the full story -

News Forum - Pattaya police allegedly ignore theft case of Japanese touristA Japanese tourist accused Pattaya Police Station officers of inaction after losing cash and belongings on his first day in Pattaya. The officers reportedly asked him to investigate the theft case himself. The victim, 78 year old Yoshiki Matsuura, reached out to Thai news agencies to expose the inaction of the Thai police to the public. He … … The story Pattaya police allegedly ignore theft case of Japanese tourist as seen on Thaiger News. Read the full story -
1
News Forum - Blow and behold: British man’s nose for trouble at Phuket AirportDrama unfolded at Phuket International Airport as a British man swapped sun, sea, and sand for cuffs at customs for cocaine possession. The 42 year old British man found himself in hot water after allegedly kicking off and creating a scene at Phuket Airport. Following his tumultuous antics, airport officers uncovered 4.11 grammes of cocaine … … The story Blow and behold: British man’s nose for trouble at Phuket Airport as seen on Thaiger News.
